query:
SELECT 
  c.name as city,
  c.country,
  c.population,
  COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) as districts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pp.id) as property_prices,
  COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) as ecology_records,
  COUNT(DISTINCT v.id) as vehicles,
  COUNT(DISTINCT u.id) as unemployment,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sb.id) as social_benefits,
  COUNT(DISTINCT me.id) as migration_events
FROM cities c
LEFT JOIN districts d ON d.city = c.name
LEFT JOIN propertyPrices pp ON pp.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN ecology e ON e.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN vehicles v ON v.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN unemployment u ON u.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN socialBenefits sb ON sb.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN migrationEvents me ON me.cityId = c.id
GROUP BY c.id
ORDER BY c.country, c.name;

LEFT JOIN ecology e ON e.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN vehicles v ON v.cityId = c.id
LEFT JOIN unemployment u ON u.cityId = c.id

LEFT JOIN migrationEvents me ON me.cityId = c.id
